IRCUtils 0.1.1¶

IRCUtils is a Python framework for communicating with the IRC protocol. It’s designed for ease of use for anything you’d need. It also has fast and simple support for writing bots.

Note

These docs were last updated on August 19, 2010. Documentation is being added daily, so be sure to check back again in the future. If there is documentation that you wish to request, file a ticket on the project page.

Reporting a bug¶

Create a bug report on the IRCUtils project page. If you have a solution to the bug, you are encouraged to include it in your report.
